item.title: CVE-2024-49317|2024-10-17T17:13:36.380Z -- zipang -- point%20maker
item.description: Improper Control of Filename for Include/Require Statement in PHP Program ('PHP Remote File Inclusion') vulnerability in ZIPANG Point Maker allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Point Maker: from n/a through 0.1.4.
